description.name: transfi
description.tagline: Instant Approval High Risk Merchant Gateway (transfi.com)
description.long: Instant approval High Risk Merchant Gateway with instant payouts to your USDC Polygon wallet using transfi.com infrastructure
features: Accept all major credit and debit cards including Visa and Mastercard directly on your site
Instant payouts to your USDC Polygon wallet
ZERO Chargebacks all payments are final.
